pullRequest.title: Single Platform Specification Support
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR restricts Jib to support a single platform specification only .
Jib will throw an error if a user specifies more than one platform .

commit.message: Make Jib support a single platform specification

nodes.bodyText:
Generally you should limit the scope of try { } catch for this type of exception-checking tests, because theoretically other code (e.g., ImageConfiguration.build()) may also throw UnsupportedOperationException. We are checking the exception message which is very specific, but in the worst case, it's possible that a test becomes useless to catch a bug if the test doesn't check the message or the message is very generic.
